I'm freelance Front-End Developer and Web Designer based in Zielona Gora, Poland. I specialise in creating interactive experiences and user-friendly interfaces whilst maintaining semantic, clean markup and SEO friendly code. I like to resolve design problems and imagine useful interaction. I’m a dreamer and a fanatic of all digital things.
